text: The National Movie Awards (NMA) was a British film awards ceremony broadcast by ITV in which the winners of the awards were chosen via popular vote. The awards were initiated in 2007 following the success of the National Television Awards, the highest-rating awards ceremony for television. The first three ceremonies were held at the Royal Festival Hall in London, with the fourth and final (to date) ceremony taking place at Wembley Arena, London. ==Winners and nominations== ===1st NMA (2007)=== The first award ceremony was held on 28 September 2007, presented by Alexander Armstrong. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
